text: the flute player once upon a time long
ago in a huge Kingdom there was a king
and a queen who were very much in love
with each other they lived a comfortable
and happy life in their castle but one
day the king got tired and started
feeling restless you wanted to go out
and battle to test his strength aleena
my dear do you remember the glorious
days where I used to fight in the
battles oh I do you were very brave then
were does that mean you don't think me
to be brave anymore I never said that my
dear I think you are the bravest of all
the warriors of the world
hahaha I think so too but I do miss
those glorious days of mine where I
would conquer kingdoms and every great
warrior would bow down to my power
you never really conquered any Kingdom
you know and warriors bowing down to you
I don't remember ever hearing of oh
never mind I'm just saying that I would
like to go out again and relive those
days well if you must I will not stop
you do as you wish oh but please return
safely as I will miss you so much oh I
will return very soon my love the King
soon gathered all his soldiers and
ordered they go to war with the
neighboring Kingdom I have heard of a
cruel king who rules that land we will
avenge the people of that Kingdom and
set them all free
King Brian and his army fought against
the wicked came bravely and fiercely but
in the end King Brian lost and he and
his entire army became prisoners in the
cruel Kings dungeons here poor King
Brian was starved and treated very badly
he was kept there for many days and soon
became very thin and weak one day he
stole a paper and quill from a sleeping
guard and wrote a letter to his Queen
aleena my queen I am trapped in the
wicked Kings dungeons please bring all
the gold jewels and every bit of the
riches that we own and save me from this
misery please hurry my love the king
took out a bracelet which he had hidden
in his clothes it had the royal emblem
of his kingdom and anyone would
recognize it he wrapped the bracelet
around the letter and threw it out
through a crack in the wall I wish
someone finds it I only hope it isn't
the enemy the bracelet was very shiny
and so attracted the attention of a bird
the little bird came up to the scroll
and picked it up by the bracelet it flew
over the lab's
and finally came to rest near a man
who is sitting and resting under a tree
oh hello what is this thing you've
brought here hmm bracelet Oh
it contains the emblem of our king how
did it get here he was a simple and
honest man and decided to go straight to
the palace to deliver it when he reached
there he went straight to the Queen oh
my queen I found this when I was out in
the countryside it may be important so I
brought it to you thank you sir
the man took his leave and after he did
so Queen aleena read the letter
immediately lost the war prisoner oh no
my love has been locked away in another
Kingdom Oh what do I do if I go by
myself to the cruel king's palace he may
take me as his prisoner as well oh and I
cannot trust anyone else with so much of
our fortune so the Queen devised a plan
to save her love away from the evil
Kings clutches that night she cut her
long and beautiful hair and dressed
herself up in a dark cloak I look very
much like a boy
I hope the wicked King gets tricked
nicely she took with her a flute and
crept away from the palace
Queen aleena walked through the night
and hoped all would be well the next day
when the Sun rose she reached the
kingdom of the wicked King
she went to the palace to meet the king
and was very nervous when she reached
there who are you and why have you come
to my kingdom - I
I am travelling flute player from a
distant land I have heard of your
greatness and decided to play you it to
none o my flute oh and you think your
tunes would be good enough to please me
what a funny thought please let me play
you just tuned I promise you never heard
anything as beautiful as what I play
very well do as you please but be warned
boy if I do not like what you play I
will throw you in with all the other
prisoners that I have Queen aleena who
was happy that she had tricked the King
and agreed to the condition she pulled
out her flute and started playing a very
beautiful tune the King started to
marvel at how lovely the tune was
he was soon mesmerised by the soft
melodious notes that played off the
fingertips of the Queen aleena she
played for quite some time and soon and
did her song Wow
that was indeed very beautiful you are
right I have never ever heard such
amazing music in my entire life why
don't you stay in my palace and play for
me
I am sorry your highness but my tunes
are only beautiful because I travel so
much the new and beautiful sights I see
make my tunes so lovely I see what you
mean very well what else can I give you
as a reward Queen aleena smiled at this
she had finally gotten her chance well
your highness you said you have a lot of
prisoners why not give me one as a
companion on my travels I would very
much like one is that all I could give
you something much better like gold or
jewels no my king I can assure you that
what I asked for is worth more than any
jewel in the world the king called for
the prisoners to be brought soon all of
them were standing in a line in front of
her when she saw her beloved husband she
almost cried out
my king what I said you Jim I choose
this man for my companion very well you
may take him Queen aleena and the King
Brian took their leave and left the
kingdom they walked for many days and
many nights but the Queen never revealed
her identity she always spoke in a low
voice and the King never thought her to
be the woman he so loved she played her
flute to him as they traveled back to
their kingdom the King loved the tunes
she played and never got tired of them
you play so well do you know I am
actually the king of the next Kingdom
let me repay you the Queen wanted to
tease her husband a little I've doubt
that you want as handsome as one and
your clothes look like you picked them

just come with me to the palace and you

king didn't go on your way I will keep

time well okay but know that
very grateful to you the two said

shortcut and soon reached her palace
before the Kings she dressed up normally
and went to meet her love when the King
entered the palace everyone in the
courtroom were very worried they ran to
the King and surrounded him my king
where have you been we were so worried
your highness you look so thin and tired
come your highness let us get you clean
clothes to wear the King smiled and
talked to all of them but he did not
look at his Queen even once he thought
she had betrayed him he did not even
notice her short hair how could she do
this to me
the only woman I ever loved and she
couldn't even save me the Queen tried to
talk to her King but he avoided her
completely
the Queen was very sad but soon decided
to plan something the next day as the
king was sitting and sulking in his
courtroom he heard a familiar tune
somewhere what is that tune I have
definitely heard it somewhere it is I
Great King I have come to visit you
I am very happy to see you but didn't
you leave me yesterday to travel around
the world how did you manage to travel
in such a short time and you really are
a king your clothes seem a little less
dusty from last time well why have you
come now
well you said you would reward me I have
come to claim my lord certainly my boy
what do you wish for gold riches a
crystal flute name it and it shall be
yours none of those things matter to me
I want only one thing and that is you
that that voice Elina took off her cloak
and revealed herself to Brian he was
astounded and soon felt very ashamed why
did you tell me it was you oh it doesn't
matter I did it just for fun
hi I am so sorry for the way I treated

know that whenever you are in trouble I
